block.facility.utb1_intake.desc: Pulls items onto UTB1 carrier from a single block/side.
block.facility.crate.desc: Holds 2048 items in any combination.;NOT compatible with hoppers.
block.facility.hyper_crate.desc: It's bigger on the inside.;NOT compatible with hoppers.
block.facility.creative_crate.desc: For testing.;Will output random items given redstone signal.
block.facility.bin_1x.desc: Holds 2048 of a single item.;Front display & convenient access.
block.facility.bin_2x.desc: Holds 1024 each of two items.;Front display & convenient access.
block.facility.bin_4x.desc: Holds 512 each of four items.;Front display & convenient access.
block.facility.creative_bin_1x.desc: Endless supply of single item.;For testing.
block.facility.creative_bin_2x.desc: Endless supply of two items.;For testing.
block.facility.creative_bin_4x.desc: Endless supply of four items.;For testing.
